attributes.action: Undersign call for 2nd EU/UK Referendum 3 Critical Items Remain, Reform or Leave
attributes.additional_details:
It is also clear that across Europe, residents & citizens of France, Denmark, Sweden and  the Netherlands are also calling for reform.

Is it time start working with our European brothers to reform the EU to:
1) reflect the modern views of its citizens, not just politicians?
2) improve efficiency, remove bureaucracy and increase cost effectiveness?

Is there a need for a EU wide referendum for Reform?
attributes.background:
Personally speaking, I wish the UK to remain a member of the EU but accept there has to be some reform.
The EU referendum failed to ask residents & citizens of UK whether they wished the UK to remain a member of the EU providing there was a clear timetable for agreed transparent, meaningful reform
